law.catch_line: An applicant for a tip jar license shall:...

section.section:
An applicant for a tip jar license shall:
submit to the agency an application on the form that the agency provides; and
subject to paragraph (2) of this subsection, pay an annual fee of $250 to the county.
The county commissioners may waive or reduce the annual fee for an organization that qualifies for a license under § 13-2420(b)(1) through (6), (10), or (11) of this subtitle.

text.section: The county shall credit license fees collected under subsection (a)(1)(ii) of this section to the general fund of the county.
